title: Backup not found error on Google Pixel when restoring after reset, Android 9 Pie
content:
1.Done Backup properly (with screenshots of each step, 6 screenshots are attached for your reference)
Settings->System->Backup
(includes SMS text messages, Call History, App data, Device Setting)

2. Reset

3. And when entered gmail and password on restore/copy data screen, it says “linked backup not found” !

4. Checked https://drive.google.com/drive/backups , No phone backup is showing there (though it was visible there before reset)

WHY ? I WANT MY PIXEL PHONE BACKUP BACK.

Stay Safe. Stay Healthy. #COVID-19

1) Backup Successful Pixel



2) Backup Successful Google Drive



3) Backup Disappeared Google Drive !
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
